original: @#// gcod yul stan thog gcig ma'i man ngag 'khor 'das rang grol zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
analyzed: gcod yul stan thogs gcig ma man ngag khor da rang grol zhes byed ba bzhugs so

original: om swasti / gzung 'dzin 'khri ba dbyings su gcod pa las //
analyzed: om swasti gzung dzin khri ba dbyings su gcod ba las

original: 'dzin med spros bral so so rang rig gi
analyzed: dzin med spros bral so so rang rig gi

original: /ngo bor rtag bzhugs drin chen bla ma'i zhabs //
analyzed: bor rtag bzhugs drin chen bla ma zhabs

original: btud nas gcod yul zab don snying por spel //
analyzed: dud nas gcod yul zab don snying por spel

original: 'dir bka' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nyams len man ngag gis snying por dril ba /
analyzed: dir bka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba nyams len man ngag gis snying por dril ba

original: bdud bzhi dbyings su gcod cing rnam rtog lam du 'khyer ba rgyal ba mi yi seng ge rnams kyis gshegs shul gcod yul gyi gdams pa 'di nyid nyams su len pa la don gsum ste /
analyzed: bdud bzhi dbyings su gcod cing rnam rtogs lam du khyer ba rgyal ba mi yi seng ge rnams kyis gshegs shul gcod yul gyi doms ba di nyid nyams su len ba la don gsum ste

original: sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes kyi bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon gro dngos gzhi rjes kyi byed ba

original: dang po sngon 'gro la theg pa chen po'i sgor 'jug pa dang / mos gus kyi byin 'beb pa'o //
analyzed: dang po sngon gro la theg ba chen po sgor jug ba dang mos gus kyi byin beb ba

original: dang po la /
analyzed: dang po la

original: blo sbyong ba dang / sbyangs nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: blo sbyong ba dang sbyong nas skyob su gro ba dang sems skyed ba

original: dang po ni /
analyzed: dang po ni

original: dal 'byor rnyed dka' ba dang tshhe mi rtag par shes nas tshhe 'di'i 'khri ba chod de phyi ma don du gnyer ba dang / de nas 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs dang / las 'bras kyi smin tshhul shes nas srid bde'i 'khri ba chod de thar pa don du gnyer ba dang /
analyzed: dal byor rnyed dka ba dang tshhe mi rtag ba shes nas tshhe di khri ba chod de phyi ma don du gnyer ba dang de nas khor ba nyes dmigs dang las bras kyi smin tshhul shes nas srid bde khri ba chod de thar ba don du gnyer ba dang

original: de nas 'gro drug pha mar shes pas byams dang snying rje chen pos rang don gyi 'khri ba chod de gzhan phan don du gnyer ba rnams dang / khyad par dal 'byor gyi rten 'di lta bu dus brgya'i za ma lan gcig gi sgo nas bogs brten te rgyud la 'byang par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas gro drug pha mar shes ba byams dang snying rje chen pos rang don gyi khri ba chod de gzhan phan don du gnyer ba rnams dang khyad ba dal byor gyi rten di lta bu dus brgya za ma lan gcig gi sgo nas bogs rten te brgyud la byang ba byed

original: gnyis pa la skyabs 'gro dang / sems bskyed gnyis kyi dang po ni /
analyzed: gnyis ba la skyob gro dang sems skyed gnyis kyi dang po ni

original: 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin me dong lta bu 'dir 'gro drug drin can gyi pha ma rnams dgra gnyen gyi ris su bcad /
analyzed: khor ba sdug sngal gyi rang bzhin me dong lta bu dir gro drug drin can gyi pha ma rnams dgra gnyen gyi ris su gcod

original: chags sdang gi yul du bzung bas 'phung ba der 'dug
analyzed: chags sdang gi yul du bzung ba phung ba der dug

original: /da ni skye ba 'di nas sangs rgyas ma thob kyi bar du gru nang gcig gi 'grul pa dang / btshon ra gcig gi nag can bzhin du thams cad 'dun jus dang blo rtshe gcig pa'i sgo nas bslu ba med pa'i skyabs dkon mchog gsum la brten par bya'o snyam pas /
analyzed: ni skye ba di nas sangs rgya ma thob kyi ba du gru nang gcig gi grul ba dang btshon ra gcig gi nag can bzhin du thams cad dun jus dang blo rtshe gcig ba sgo nas bslu ba med ba skyob dkon(d) mchog gsum la rten ba byed snyam ba

original: mdun gyi nam mkhar seng khri pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan la rtsha ba'i bla ma dang gnyis su med pa'i ma gcig lab kyi sgrol ma yum chen mo'i rnam par bzhugs pa la /
analyzed: mdun gyi nam mkhar seng khri pad+ma nyi zla gdan la rtsha ba bla ma dang gnyis su med ba ma gcig lab kyi sgrol ma yum chen mo rnam ba bzhugs ba la

original: bka' brgyud kyi bla ma dkon mchog rin po che rnam pa gsum sogs skyabs gnas thams cad kyis bskor ba sprin phung gtibs pa ltar bzhugs par bsam la /

original: bdag gzhan sems can thams cad kyi skyid sdug legs nyes khyed rang mkhyen snyam du /
analyzed: bdag gzhan sems can thams cad kyi skyid sdug legs nyes khyed rang mkhyen snyam du

analyzed: nam mkha gnas su nam mkha gang ba yi

analyzed: bdag sogs gro kun gus ba skyob su mchi

analyzed: zhes skyob gro ci nus byed ba mthar skyob yul khor rnams rtsha ba bla ma la sdud

original: thog mar dkar 'gyed la gtsho bor byas nas /
analyzed: thogs mar dkar gyed la gtsho bor byed nas

analyzed: tshhul des gnyan khrod shis sar lan kha yar grim nas

original: bshad ma thag pa'i nyams len gyi tshhul de spros bcas dang / zhi gcod kyi mthar byams snying rje dang dbyings rig bsre ba spel mar sgom pa spros med dang / de'i rjes su yum don kho na la mnyam par 'jog pa shin tu spros med kyi rnal 'byor yin pas de rnams 'brel chags su bsgom /

original: gnyan sar 'gro khar mos gus la ltem rkyang chags sdang dam sel gyi rkyen byung na lam du mi 'gro bas /
analyzed: gnyan sar gro khar mos gus la ltem rkyang chags sdang dam sel gyi rkyen byung na lam du mi gro ba

original: mos gus kyi rtshal bskyed pa'i gsol 'debs dang bshags sdom tshhogs gtor rten 'brel khyad par can sgrig pa gal che'o //
analyzed: mos gus kyi rtshal skyed ba gsol debs dang chags sdom tshhogs thor rten brel khyad ba can sgrig ba gal che

original: gnyis pa lhong gcod tshhar tshhad ngos 'dzin pa la lhong gcod tshhar gsum las /

analyzed: rmi lam ni

analyzed: gyen du dzeg ba dang dri ma med ba gos gyon ba dang nam mkha la phur ba dang gzhan gyis phyag dang skor ba byed ba dang chos ju ba srog snying bul ba sogs ni khyad ba gyi rtags so
